record.field: Calcul des heures et des jours
La règle des Jours Fériés travaillés
Coût des jours fériés payés travaillés
La règle du Coût des jours fériés payés travaillés

result = round(((contract.wage) / (payslip.working_days * 8)) * ((payslip.working_days * 8)- ((worked_days.LEAVE90 and worked_days.LEAVE90.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.Sick_unpaid and worked_days.Sick_unpaid.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.OUT and worked_days.OUT.number_of_hours)+(worked_days.LEAVE130 and worked_days.LEAVE130.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.LEAVE140 and worked_days.LEAVE140.number_of_hours)-(worked_days.WORK160 and worked_days.WORK160.number_of_hours))),3)
La règle du salaire de base

result = round(((contract.prime) / (payslip.working_days * 8)) * ((payslip.working_days * 8)- ((worked_days.LEAVE90 and worked_days.LEAVE90.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.Sick_unpaid and worked_days.Sick_unpaid.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.OUT and worked_days.OUT.number_of_hours) +(worked_days.LEAVE130 and worked_days.LEAVE130.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.LEAVE140 and worked_days.LEAVE140.number_of_hours)-(worked_days.WORK160 and worked_days.WORK160.number_of_hours))),3)

result= (((worked_days.WORK100 and worked_days.WORK100.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.WORK122 and worked_days.WORK122.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.WORK160 and worked_days.WORK160.number_of_hours))/8)

result = round((68.181 / (payslip.working_days * 8)) * ((payslip.working_days * 8)- (worked_days.LEAVE90 and worked_days.LEAVE90.number_of_hours) - (worked_days.Sick_unpaid and worked_days.Sick_unpaid.number_of_hours) -(worked_days.OUT and worked_days.OUT.number_of_hours)),3) if (employee.categorie == "Cadre") else round((61.808 / (payslip.working_days * 8)) * ((payslip.working_days * 8)- (worked_days.LEAVE90 and worked_days.LEAVE90.number_of_hours) - (worked_days.Sick_unpaid and worked_days.Sick_unpaid.number_of_hours)-(worked_days.OUT and worked_days.OUT.number_of_hours)),3)
La règle du Indemnité de transport

result = round((11.643 / (payslip.working_days * 8)) * ((payslip.working_days * 8) - (worked_days.LEAVE90 and worked_days.LEAVE90.number_of_hours) - (worked_days.Sick_unpaid and worked_days.Sick_unpaid.number_of_hours) -(worked_days.OUT and worked_days.OUT.number_of_hours)),3)
La règle du Prime de présence
La règle du Coût des heures d'absence

result = ((worked_days.LEAVE90 and worked_days.LEAVE90.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.Sick_unpaid and worked_days.Sick_unpaid.number_of_hours) + (worked_days.OUT and worked_days.OUT.number_of_hours) )
